event-group.description: if you have found this event then this event dosnt have to do with the actual game. but it dose have to do with how to play the game while testing cirten Events. in order to move use the W,A,S and D keys. To do a normal Attack use the K Button and to do a Strong Attack use the L Button. To Do a super Move get to a cirten level on the KI meter and press the F key and to do a alternet super press down and the F key. To Dash press the Z key. to charge press the X key while not moving. press the B key to transform and the down and B button to go back to your base form.
event-group.title: WELCOME ABORDE THE TEAM
